dcterms:creator: A. Chopra
A. C. Bell
dcterms:description: The PyATMOS dataset consists of 124,314 stable atmospheres of Earth-like planets around solar-type stars generated with a 1D coupled photochemistry-climate model. Each PT profile is represented by two 101-dimensional vectors for pressures and temperatures, along with additional atmospheric quantities.
dcterms:title: PyATMOS

dcterms:creator: J. M. Goyal
N. Mayne
dcterms:description: The Goyal-2020 dataset includes 11,293 PT profiles corresponding to 89 hot Jupiters, each with various recirculation factors, metallicities, and C/O ratios. It also contains transmission and emission spectra for each atmosphere, as well as over 250 abundance profiles of different chemical species.
dcterms:title: Goyal-2020
